SELECT cs.`NAME`, cv.ID, cv.INS_OUT, cv.STAFF_ID, cv.IS_VACATION, cv.TYPE, cv.`DAY`, cv.REMARK, cv.DATE, cv.CREATE_TIME, cv.MODIFY_TIME FROM cy_vacation AS cv
LEFT JOIN cy_staff_inside AS cs ON(cs.STAFF_ID=cv.STAFF_ID)
LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS cs ON(cs.STAFF_ID=cv.STAFF_ID)
LEFT JOIN cy_staff_send AS cs ON(cs.STAFF_ID=cv.STAFF_ID)
WHERE cv.INS_OUT=#{vacation.insOut} AND cs.DELETED=0 AND FIND_IN_SET(cs.IS_LEAVE, #{vacation.isLeave})
AND FIND_IN_SET(cs.`TYPE`, '0')
AND FIND_IN_SET(cs.`TYPE`, '1,2,3')
cs.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND (LEFT(cv.DATE, 7) <= #{vacation.date} AND LEFT(RIGHT(cv.DATE, 10) ,7) >= #{vacation.date})
AND FIND_IN_SET(cv.IS_VACATION, #{vacation.isVacation})
AND FIND_IN_SET(cv.TYPE, #{vacation.type})

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT csi.STAFF_ID) FROM cy_staff_inside AS csi LEFT JOIN cy_vacation AS cv ON(cv.STAFF_ID=csi.STAFF_ID) WHERE cv.TYPE='年假' AND cv.DATE>=CONCAT(#{vacation.day}-1,'-12-16') AND cv.DATE<=CONCAT(#{vacation.day},'-12-15')
AND csi.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vacation.name},'%')

SELECT csi.`NAME`, csi.SORT_NUM, csi.WORK_DATE, cv.ID, cv.INS_OUT, csi.STAFF_ID, cv.IS_VACATION, cv.TYPE, cv.`DAY`, cv.REMARK, GROUP_CONCAT(cv.DATE) AS `DATE`, cv.CREATE_TIME, cv.MODIFY_TIME FROM cy_staff_inside AS csi LEFT JOIN cy_vacation AS cv ON(cv.DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vacation.date},'%') AND csi.STAFF_ID=cv.STAFF_ID AND cv.TYPE='年假') WHERE csi.DELETED=0 AND FIND_IN_SET(csi.IS_LEAVE, #{vacation.isLeave})
csi.`NAME` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND csi.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vacation.idNum},'%')
GROUP BY csi.STAFF_ID ORDER BY IS_LEAVE ASC, SORT_NUM ASC
